abstract: BP is close to a deal with its oligarch co-owners of TNK-BP that would see board changes at the Russian oil major, the departure of TNK-BP’s BP-nominated chief executive, and which could lead to 20 percent of TNK-BP being floated, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: BP is close to a deal with its oligarch co-owners of TNK-BP that would see board changes at the Russian oil major, the departure of TNK-BP’s BP-nominated chief executive, and which could lead to 20 percent of TNK-BP being floated, according to Reuters.

headline.main: In TNK-BP Settlement, an I.P.O. May Be in the Offing, Reports Say
